attributes.action: Make main street safe again stop every non resident from going down it
attributes.additional_details: For the safety of the kids and residents on main street
attributes.background: Main street in goldthorpe is bad kids play out and we get everyone thats a non resident speeding down it theres already been a crash also stop school parents blocking and parking too

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
